title: citizen_dashboard_page_display
description: Verify that the citizen dashboard page loads successfully and displays the interface for citizens to upload images for criminal detection.

title: image_upload_and_processing
description: Test the image upload API to ensure images are accepted, processed using OpenCV for face detection, and appropriate detection results are returned.

title: police_dashboard_page_display
description: Verify that the police dashboard page loads correctly and displays detection reports and criminal activity monitoring information.

title: citizen_login_authentication
description: Test the citizen login API to ensure valid credentials authenticate the user and invalid credentials are rejected.

title: police_login_authentication
description: Test the police login API to verify that police officers can authenticate successfully with valid credentials and are denied access with invalid credentials.

title: citizen_registration_process
description: Verify the citizen registration API to ensure new users can register successfully and duplicate or invalid registrations are handled properly.
